metadata.title: CVE-2020-29547 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Citadel through webcit-926.Meddler-in-the-middle attackers can pipeline commands after POP3 STLS, IMAPSTARTTLS, or SMTP STARTTLS commands, injecting cleartext commands into anencrypted user session. This can lead to credential disclosure.

criterions.comment: citadel package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
